MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.33pm due to a damaged underground cable caused by a third party and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:18pm on the 6th of November 2020.
